data.name: Spark Circuits VR
data.detailed_description:
Spark! Pop! Boom! Short circuiting has never been so much fun! Make circuits spark in Spark Circuits VR, where anything with a circuit that you touch will spark before you. The bigger the circuit, the bigger the spark!

Nobody knows why circuit sparker Riley Short is able to short circuit electronics, but straybots are on the rampage and only he and his mysterious power can help save the robot family home of his best friend, Point One!

Join Point One and his little robot sister Zeal for action, drama, robots, original music, a giant board game room with a dragon, futuristic glowing hovering things, and yet more robots in this original VR cartoon adventure, Spark Circuits VR!

Featuring:
  • Full English voice acting
  • Optional subtitles
  • A useful Save Spot
  • Two VR movement systems to choose from
  • An optional Catch Assist function featuring a refined British accent and bow tie
  • And again, a giant board game room with a dragon

Spark Circuits VR – Now you’re sparkin' with power!

data.short_description: Spark! Pop! Boom! Short circuiting has never been so much fun! Make circuits spark in Spark Circuits VR, where anything with a circuit that you touch will spark before you. The bigger the circuit, the bigger the spark!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
